locations: 740 Sprewell Bluff State Park, Thomaston, Georgia, USA
Old Meriwether County Jail, Greenville, Georgia, USA
imdb.plot outline: Emily Thornton is visited by Detective Robert Grant and is asked if she knows anything about her husband's whereabouts and the murder of a local woman. Emily to opens up about her marriage, and the physical and verbal abuse she endured for a decade. Through flashback sequences, the story will unravel new details on Jack's whereabouts and eventually the suspect of the murder of Martha Bradley.
imdb.title: The Atonement
plot: In a small town where everyone has secrets, she may have the darkest of them all.

Emily Thornton is visited by Detective Robert Grant and is asked if she knows anything about her husband's whereabouts and the murder of a local woman. Emily to opens up about her marriage, and the physical and verbal abuse she endured for a decade. Through flashback sequences, the story will unravel new details on Jack's whereabouts and eventually the suspect of the murder of Martha Bradley.::Vanessa D. Anthony
